segments.text: Excuse me . In this museum , you are not supposed to take pictures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that right ? I didn't know it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you give me your camera ? We have to confiscate your film .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you forgive me . Could you return my camera ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will keep and return it later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . Then , can I buy slides and picture postcards somewhere ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can buy them at the souvenir shop near the exit .
segments.speaker: S1
